## NSFWQI (protÃƒÂ³tipo)
```{r}
path <- system.file("extdata","exemplo_chamagunga.csv", package = "tikatuwq")
df <- read_wq(path)
df$do  <- df$od; df$fc <- df$coliformes; df$ph <- df$pH; df$bod <- df$dbo; df$sst <- df$tds
```
